mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(corp_name) AS socialName, link AS link, title AS title, preview AS preview, image AS image, date AS date, provider AS provider FROM news, corporation, news_corp_relation WHERE news.news_id = news_corp_relation.news_id AND news_corp_relation.corp_id = corporation.corp_id AND DATE(news.date) = #{date} GROUP BY link ORDER BY date DESC
